dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Casey Graff
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of records of bank account holders with their personal, financial and demographic information. The prediction task classifies individuals as good/bad credit risks.
dcterms:title: UCI German credit dataset

dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Casey Graff
dcterms:description: This dataset contains demographic information of individuals along with information on their level of education, occupation, working hours etc. The task is to predict whether the annual income of an individual exceeds 50K.
dcterms:title: Adult Income Data

dcterms:description: This dataset contains information on offenders from Broward County, Florida. The task is to predict whether an individual will recommit a crime within two years.
dcterms:title: COMPAS

dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Casey Graff
dcterms:description: This dataset contains demographic information and personality traits (e.g., openness, sensation-seeking) of individuals. The task is to predict when an individual consumed magic mushrooms.
dcterms:title: Drug Consumption

dcterms:description: This dataset is generated synthetically following the causal graph of the German dataset. It is used to evaluate the correctness of LEWISâ€™s scores compared to ground truth scores calculated using the structural equations.
dcterms:title: German-syn
